name: Velour-Xtensions Self-Stick Lash Clusters
about: What it is:A set of pre-glued, these self-adhesive lash clusters that are perfect for beginnings, easy to apply and mess-free.u200b..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Handmade with lightweight and natural-looking fibers, these Self-Stick Lash Clusters are applied underneath your natural lashes for a seamless look. Use three clusters per eye for a full lash extension look or one to two clusters to create a half lash.
ingredients: Acrylates Copolymer, Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently curl your natural lashes with the Velour Too Extra Lash Curler (sold separately)..-Carefully removing them from the tray, hold the cluster from the middle-outer end to avoid touching the band area. u200b.-Position the cluster underneath your natural lashes.u200b.-Squeeze the clusters and your natural lashes together with the Too Real Extension Tool (sold separately).u200b.-Use three clusters per eye for a full lash extension look or one to two clusters to create a half lash..-Remove with clean fingers. Gently lift the clusters, holding them from the middle-outer end of the band.

shades.shade_descriptor: flirty lash style that lifts the eyes
flirty lash style that lifts the eyes
